price: Isaan warra yeroo balaan isaan tuqxe "Nuti kan Rabbiiti, nuti gara Isaatti deebi’oodha" jedhaniidha.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَٰبَتۡهُم مُّصِيبَةٞ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّآ إِلَيۡهِ رَٰجِعُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.
